3bd3a52280388520c64ec813dd1e4ffb3a0063a2.commitMessage: spelling: fix some typos in code/javadoc/comments

67e6b46e9fa424fbd0a2fba611a3a59b30727692.commitMessage: Issue #3153: IllegalTokenTextCheck and IllegalTokenCheck does not work with COMMENT_CONTENT token

4c078ba710068498ca513ce115993e30dab4562a.commitMessage:
Make "private" methods "static" where possible. #46

SonarQube rule: ["private" methods that don't access instance data should be "static"](http://nemo.sonarqube.org/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS2325).

Rationale: private methods that don't access instance data can be static to prevent any misunderstanding about the contract of the method.

dd47d21b9eb0d254016315790db9be5db2c28ea4.commitMessage:
Detect only label as illegal token in IllegalToken check. #1162

Switch and postfix increment/decrement are no longer considered as illegal by default.
